data.oai_dc:dc: This data set contains frequencies of the two most common alleles (MCA: 237 and 246 bp in length) in the Dca promoter region for 17 D. melanogaster populations collected in 2005 (Fig. 3). Frequencies are given for all data independent of the In(3R)P inversion and for inverted and standard arrangements only. Note longitudes in data are approximate. When using this data, please cite the original publication:McKechnie, S. W., Blacket, M. J., Song, S. V., Rako, L., Carroll, X., Johnson, T. K., Jensen, L. T., Lee, S. F., Wee, C. W., and Hoffmann, A. A. (2010). A clinally varying promoter polymorphism associated with adaptive variation in wing size in Drosophila. Molecular Ecology 19: 775-784
